ru.cos.cs.agents.framework
Interface Agent

All Known Subinterfaces:
TrafficAgent, TrafficLightNetwork, Vehicle
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAgent, AbstractMeter, AbstractRoadAgent, AbstractTrafficLightNetwork, AbstractVehicle, AverageTravelTimeMeter, DensityFlowMeter, DensityMeter, Destination, FlowMeter, InstantAverageSpeedMeter, LinkAverageTravelSpeedMeter, NetworkAverageTravelSpeedMeter, Origin, PeakAwareTLN, RegularTLN, RegularVehicle, SATSMeter, SimpleAgent, SimpleOrigin, TotalTravelTimeMeter, TrafficVolumeMeter, VAHMeter
public interface Agent

Agent in the agent-based simulation system.

Author:
zroslaw

Method Detail

act

void act(float dt)
Agent behavior for next time step dt. Method must change both agent and universe states.

Parameters:
dt - time step

isAlive

boolean isAlive()
Method should return false when agent has completed his life cycle.

Returns:
alive status

setAgentId

void setAgentId(int id)
Set agent's agentId

Parameters:
id -

getAgentId

int getAgentId()
Get agent's agentId

Returns:

kill

void kill()
Kill the agent.
It will no longer acts in the system as agent, but still will be presented in the universe as agent's corpse.

destroy

void destroy()
Destroy the agent.
Remove all relations between the agent and universe.
I.e. agent instance will be completely removed from universe.
